name: Arena 9th
description:
Welcome to the AUTO-CARD Competition of The Ninth Universe. You can show your skills, enter a higher level of competition, and strive to win the glory of the universe championship.
Don't go to The Eighth Universe. The King of Stomach is not suitable for you. Their meals are calculated by tons. You will not only fail to win the place, but may also become the fresh P-R-O-T-E-I-N!
Don't go to The Tenth Universe, the invisible record of 1600 earth years. If you go there, you may not see anyone!
......
The Ninth Universe is a peace-loving universe. All disputes here can be solved by a game. Be the next champion. There is one seat left on the space flight.

Description

Arena 9 is a strategy card game with misplaced PVP matches, where you can simulate recruiting soldiers, forming teams, defeating enemies, eliminating opponents, gaining higher rankings, advancing to more advanced matches, and finally winning the title of Universe Champion.
The game contains 32 hero cards, 61 soldier cards, 21 spell cards, 14 mask cards, and 24 bonus cards.
All game battle data comes from real players, and there are no "dummies" or "AI" in the game. You'll be matched with other players who have recently completed the same difficulty and received the same resources, ensuring that you don't have to spend a lot of time waiting while playing smoothly. At the same time, after your match is completed, your data will also be acquired and played by other players, and the elimination data of the game is also the real battle data of history.
Since the game is made by myself, the game does not contain special effects, and art resources are not abundant.

Rules of the Game

1. Your character: You play as a contestant from a different universe in the game;
2. Choose a hero: Choose one of the 7 random heroes as the commander and the other as the adjutant;
3. Hero Skills: Commander comes with two skills, Adjutant comes with one skill, which can help strengthen your clan;
4. Soldier Card: You need to place the soldier card in the soldier's position to fight;
5. Mask Cards: Masks can give your soldiers extra skill effects;
6. Spell Cards: Spells can directly strengthen your soldiers, or obtain additional resources;
7. Enemies: Each turn will assign you an enemy, and soldiers on both sides will fight the enemy;
8. Hero Health: Hero Health will be lost when fighting enemies, and will be eliminated when health is reduced to 0, and the later the elimination ranking;
9. Promotion: If you rank higher in the competition, you can advance to a more advanced tournament, the highest level of the competition is the Cosmic Finals;
10. Format: The competition is set up in 9 competition levels, and the number of participants in each level is different, which are "Village League(20)", "Township League(30)", "County League(40)", "Municipal League(50)", "Provincial League(60)", "National League(70)", "Star League(80)", "Galaxy League(90)", "Universe League(100)".
